evidence.text:
Person A: Is the man you saw that night here in the courtroom today?
Person B: Yes. He is here today. That's him right there.
Person A: Let the record show the witness identified the man he saw as the defendant, James Michael Sythe.
Person A: The State rests, Your Honor.

Person B: I was glad to help. Everyone was so grateful. And if I do say, it felt pretty good. To be needed again.
Person B: Right. Well, if there's anything else I can do, just give a holler. Tea's always hot.
